analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika na hetu sa hetuka duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham na hetum sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na hetu

original: nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha
analyzed: na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha
pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham na hetum ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na hetu na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
